page.title: 06MY LIFE,WALTON-L-D,PRESTON
page.content: Every{morning}when it is school I get up out of bed at 7.45a.m. I get washed and dressed. When I have straightened my bed I go down stairs for my breakfast and I usually have cornflakes.After my breakfast I get ready for school and go.I walk there. When I am at{school}we get ready for assembly and go into the hall.After assembly I come back into the classroom and do some work.At ten o'clock we usually do some maths, and at 10.30p.m. it is time to go home. Every{weekend}I get up later than I do in the week. I get up between 9.00 a.m. and 10.a.m.We go to town for some shopping.Sometimes I have my dinner in a cafe in town. When it is a nice day I sunbathe or I play with my sister.When it is about 5.00p.m. we go in for tea and after it I help to clean up.I usually go to bed at 10.00.
